arts.ttl: Bristol City player ratings vs Blackburn Rovers as Robins cut gap to play-off places with win
arts.sum: Midway through the second half, he deserved an assist for his brilliant lofted through ball into Nahki Wells, but somehow, the Bermudain's chipped shot was cleared off of the line. Bristol City Live is now on WhatsApp and we want you to join our community.

arts.ttl: Nahki Wells fires winner from bench as Bristol City step up play-off push
arts.sum: Scott Twine and Andreas Weimann were also on target at Ashton Gate.

arts.ttl: Bristol City predicted team vs Blackburn Rovers as Robins look to end three-match winless run
arts.sum: With that in mind, here's how we think Bristol City will start against Blackburn Rovers at Ashton Gate this afternoon... They say there's no rest for the wicked and just a couple of days after their draw with Sheffield Wednesday, Bristol City are back in action today as they face Blackburn Rovers at Ashton Gate.

arts.ttl: Blackburn Rovers predicted team as injury crisis necessitates system switch
arts.sum: Blackburn Rovers have limited options for their trip to Ashton Gate

arts.ttl: Blackburn suffer triple injury blow ahead of Bristol City clash as Eustace shares fitness update
arts.sum: Blackburn Rovers have suffered a triple injury blow ahead of their clash with Bristol City after John Eustace admitted all of Callum Brittain, Danny Batth and Joe Rankin-Costello are likely to miss the trip to Ashton Gate this weekend. While the result was disappointing for Eustace, perhaps more concerning was the fact that both Brittain and Batth were forced off with injuries and Rankin-Costello had to play the final stages of the game with an issue as Rovers had used up all their substitutions.

arts.ttl: Every word Liam Manning said on Blackburn Rovers, Bristol City's depth, Mayulu interest and more
arts.sum: Goals from Nahki Wells and Ross McCrorie twice helped the Robins come from behind against Danny Rohl's Owls to draw 2-2 and ensure the gap to the play-off places wasn't stretched further. Obviously, it's a quick turnaround now for Saturday so I think the main bit is the lads being ready when called upon.
